name: discord-bot-template
description: A minimal Discord bot template with secure command deployment

scripts-comments.start: Runs the bot in production mode
scripts-comments.dev: Runs the bot with hot-reload for development
scripts-comments.deploy: Deploys commands based on NODE_ENV (separate from bot runtime)
scripts-comments.deploy:prod: Deploys commands globally (takes up to 1 hour to propagate)
scripts-comments.deploy:dev: Deploys commands to development guild (instant update)
